questionTitle: - "The movie ............... last night was terrific." - "What is it about?"
He didn't like the people ............. disagreed with his opinion.
The programmer explained in great ................. how the computer worked .
The wind blew so hard and so strongly that the windows ................
The camera can't be loaded . I will help you find the ................ for it.
If you don't stop teasing the cat, it'll ................ you.
His family travel to Australia by the most ................ route.
When I ................ the doctor, I will ask him to look at my throat.
- "My writing has improved a lot in this class." - "Mine has, too. All the students ............. do well in writing."
Can you do me a(n) ................ and cook the meal?
My class has 17 students, most of ............... speak English very well.
Daisy is going to have a short rest because she ................ a headache.
Ann's doctor insists ................ for a few days.
It is imperative that you ................ at home.
I borrowed four books on gardening the last time I .............. to the library.
Cars have become much more complicated . .............., mechanics need more training than in the past.
I didn't get home after midnight last night. Otherwise, I ............... your call.
